message: Let's be fair and split the money almost evenly. This way we both benefit from participating.
I appreciate the fairness in your proposal, but I think I can do slightly better.  Let's flip the roles this time, and we can both benefit from the 10% inflation decrease.
Bob, it seems we both want a fair deal. Let's stop wasting time with inflation eating away at our potential gains. A 50/50 split is the most logical solution.
